thread.title_full: Island Routes Named Caribbean's Best Tour Company At The World Travel Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Island Routes Named Caribbean's Best Tour Company At The World Travel Awards
text:
Island Routes
MONTEGO BAY, Jamaica , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Jamaica -based tour company Island Routes Caribbean Adventures has done it again! The region's fastest growing tour provider has been named the Caribbean's Leading Adventure Tour Operator for the sixth straight year at the 22nd Annual World Travel Awards.
Established in Jamaica just six years ago, the company's commitment to explosive growth and a continued focus on providing the highest quality experiences across the Caribbean has seen it forge a reputation as one of the most credible and progressive companies in the region.
Now in 2015, Island Routes, whose motto is "Live Funner", currently offers over 500 authentic tours and experiences across eleven Caribbean destinations, with plans in place to expand into eleven more by the end of 2016. Current locations include Antigua , Bahamas , Barbados , Grenada , Cayman Islands , Jamaica , Saint Lucia , Turks & Caicos, Dominican Republic , Aruba and St. Maarten.
Adam Stewart , Chief Executive Officer of Island Routes commented, "To be recognized by the World Travel Awards is such an honor. This award shows the hard work and the commitment of everyone at Island Routes to building a full service tour company. From working with local partners to enhance services and create added value, to providing first class destination management services and fun family snorkeling adventures, the company is committed to being the best in the region with the help of its partners and employees. We've taken first class service and safety standards people demand and combined it with peerless local knowledge â€“ and it's proven to be a recipe for success."
In addition to its status as the region's greatest tour provider, Island Routes also offers full Destination Management services with an expert team of dedicated SITE accredited professionals handling all aspects of meetings, incentives and business groups. Island Routes provides ground handling services in Jamaica for Air Canada Vacations and BookIt.com, as well as exclusive tour desk management services across the Caribbean for Sandals, Beaches and Grand Pineapple Resorts, and the Hyatt Ziva and Hyatt Zilara Rose Hall, Jamaica .
With owned and operated assets including the Caribbean's newest and most luxurious fleet of catamarans and sport fishing boats, private transfers and The River Bumpkin Farm, Island Routes prides itself on providing flexible, customized, solution orientated results.
